mapper.select: select w.work_no workNo, w.work_location workLocation, w.work_people workPeople, w.work_kind workKind, m.member_code memberCode, s.site_code siteCode, c.confirm_code confirmCode from work w, member m, site s, confirm c where m.member_code = w.member_code AND w.site_code = s.site_code AND w.confirm_code = c.confirm_code
